title: Chapter 1992 - Chapter 1992: Chapter 1992-Killing Their Way To The Wind
body:
Chapter 1992 - Chapter 1992: Chapter 1992-Killing Their Way To The Wind

Chapter 1992: Chapter 1992-killing their way to the Wind

Clan’s territory

Translator: 54

“You’ve broken through, good!”

Long Chen and Feng Ling were overjoyed.

Luo Xiang’s battle strength had increased greatly as he broke through the opponent’s attack. He cooperated with Feng Ling and Long Chen to fight the opponent.

Luo Xiang’s breakthrough had increased their combat strength, and they were finally able to deal with the enemy.

No one noticed that in the distance, a cold gaze would sweep across Lu Ming and the rest from time to time.

This man was Fengwuchen.

these people have gathered together. Sooner or later, they will be a great threat to our Wind Clan. We must get rid of them as soon as possible!

Feng wuchen’s eyes flashed with a fierce light as he sent a message to his subordinates.

After that, they attacked some of the three-eyed gods, and after a few moves, they suddenly changed their direction and charged toward Feng Ling, Long Chen, and Luo Xiang.

&Nbsp; the three-eyed God race members were furiously chasing after them.

Soon, they were approaching the battlefield of Feng Ling, Long Chen, and Luo Xiang.

“Not good!”

The expressions of Huang Ling and the other two changed.

Feng wuchen was trying to use the three-eyed God race to kill them.

you’ve come at the right time. These kids are the top heaven’s favorites of the human race. They’ll be a great threat in the future. We must get rid of them first!

One of the three-eyed God race members who was fighting against Feng wuchen and the others roared and called for the three-eyed God race members who were chasing after Fengwuchen to come and kill them.

“Alright, let’s kill these people first!”

The three-eyed God race that was chasing after Feng wuchen’s group immediately gave up on Feng wuchen’s group and charged towards Huang Ling’s group.

Among Feng wuchen and the others, only Fengwuchen was a top-notch heaven’s favorite. The others were all old and had limited potential.

Compared to killing Feng wuchen and the others, the three-eyed God race would naturally be more willing to kill Huang Ling, Long Chen, and Luo Xiang.

Instantly, at least three to four Emperors-to-be and more than ten absolute Saints charged toward them.

The three of them changed their expressions and retreated quickly, but they were entangled by the two Emperor-to-be.

“Hahaha!”

Feng wuchen was overjoyed. The process had gone much smoother than he had expected. He brought the experts of the Wind Clan and left this place quickly.

On the other side, Lu Ming also discovered this scene.

“Not good!”

Lu Ming s expression turned ugly. With a wave of his hand, a beam of Saint energy swept Xiangxiang up and quickly rushed towards Huang Ling and the others.

However, he was still a distance away from Huang Ling and the others. Fie would need time to get there.

Facing the siege of so many Emperor-to-be experts, Huang Ling, Long Chen, and Luo Xiang were in a fatal crisis.

Pfft!

Long Chen s body was pierced by a destructive light, and his flesh exploded.

T he scene was extremely terrifying.

Luo Xiang didn’t have it easy either. One of his arms had been chopped off.

Although Huang Ling had the law of the unperishable flame, she had blocked more attacks and was severely injured.

The three of them were heavily injured and were in danger.

“You guys, quickly retreat!”

Long Chen roared and his long hair fluttered in the wind. He kept punching out with both fists. The figures of divine elephants appeared one after another and rushed toward the other party, lie was fighting several Emperor-to-be alone to seize the opportunity for Huang Ling and Luo Xiang to escape.

However, he was alone and his combat power was limited. The divine elephant was destroyed and his body was hit. Half of his body directly exploded and he almost died.

“Die!”

A three-eyed Emperor-to-be’s eyes flashed with ferocity as he swung his axe ar Long Chen’s head. If this attack landed, Long Chen would definitely die.

At this moment, Long Chen, Feng Ling, and Luo Xiang’s bodies flickered like phantoms. In the next instant, they reappeared a thousand meters away, causing the three-eyed God race’s attack to miss.

A petite figure appeared beside Feng Ling and the others.

it was bubbles timely help that saved them.

“Kill!”

The three-eyed God race members charged towards Pao Pao.

“You’re the ones who are going to die, chirp chirp!”

Bubbles pressed down with her small hand, and the air rippled. The bodies of the absolute Saints were instantly ground into pieces by the spatial power.

Even the emperors-to-be were forced to retreat and spit our blood.

space-time law, no, retreat!

One of the three-eyed God race quasi-emperors expression changed drastically as he tried to retreat.

However, a few transparent bubbles appeared and enveloped them.

“Die!”

A cold voice came from the sky. Then, spearlights burst down and pierced into their heads.

A total of seven Emperor-to-be were killed in an instant.

Lu Ming descended and waved his hand, collecting the three-eyed God’s corpse. He then took a step forward and appeared beside Huang Ling and the others.

“You guys recuperate first!”

Lu Ming said.

Long Chen, Luo Xiang, and Feng Ling were severely injured, especially Long Chen and Luo Xiang. Their bodies were almost blown apart, bur with the strength of their spirit bodies, it was not difficult for them to regrow their limbs.

The three of them sat cross-legged in the air and began to recuperate.

Lu Ming and bubbles stood guard in the surroundings. Any three-eyed God that tried to attack them was mercilessly killed by them.

Long Chen and Luo Xiang’s bodies began to heal and recover.

A few hours later, the three of them had fully recovered from their external injuries. However, it would take a few days for them to return to their peak condition.

Thump thump thump!

At this moment, the war drums began to beat, and the three-eyed God race began to retreat.

“Fengwuchen!”

Lu Ming’s eyes flickered with cold murderous intent, lie then walked in the direction of rhe base.

Luo Tianyi, Huang Ling, and the rest looked at each other and followed Lu Ming.

Soon, they returned to the base.

Lu Ming did not stop, lie kept going up and finally came to a magnificent Hall.

T his Palace was the wind race’s encampment.

Lu Ming walked toward the main entrance of the hall.

“Stop right there. This is the territory of the wind race. Other than the members of the wind race, only those who have been invited can enter. Have you been invited?”

In front of the door, two strong men blocked Lu Ming.

“Get lost!”

Lu Ming shouted loudly. The two strong men’s bodies shook violently and they were sent flying, vomiting blood.

“You, how dare you…”

One of them pointed at Lu Ming and shouted.

Bang!

Lu Ming suddenly took a step forward. A terrifying force surged out and bombarded the door of the Wind Clan’s Palace.

BOOM!

The door exploded into pieces.

T he two big men guarding the door were stunned.

T here was actually someone who dared to break the door of the Wind Clan’s Palace. This was simply a slap to the Wind Clan’s face. How audacious!

T he commotion here had also alerted the other forces.

Figures flew out from the palaces and looked over.

it’s Lu Ming, lie’s so bold. He actually smashed rhe Wind Clan s Gate!

what happened? why did Lu Ming do that? ”

1 heard that Lu Ming and Fengwuchen have a grudge!

T he surroundings were abuzz with discussion.

“Who are you? you’re looking for death!”

Angry roars came from the Wind Clan’s Palace. Figures rushed out one after another, looking at Lu Ming and the others with cold, knife-like eyes.

“Where’s Feng wuchen? tell him to come out and face his death!”

Lu Ming shouted, ignoring the wind tribe experts.

“You are Lu Ming?”

One of the Wind Clan’s experts recognized Lu Ming and his eyes narrowed slightly.

Back then, the Wind Clan naturally knew about the commotion that Lu Ming had caused in the ancient Moon Holy Land..
